そおっと: (そーっと) - softly; gently; quietly; secretly
そがぁな: (そがぁな) - (Hiroshima dialect)  such (about the actions of the listener, or about ideas expressed or understood by the listener); like that; that sort of
そぎ切り: (そぎぎり) - cutting a thin object (e.g. vegetable stalk) at a 45 degree angle; cutting in a way that blunts or rounds the cut
そぎ落とす: (そぎおとす) - to chip off; to scrape off; to prune
そぐう: (そぐう) - to be suitable; to be appropriate; to match
そぐわない: (soguwanai) - inadequado, não combinando, fora de caráter
そこいら中: (そこいらじゅう) - everywhere; all over the place
そこそこ: (sokosoko) - razoavelmente, justamente, tudo bem, moderado; apressadamente, com pressa, tendo mal terminado; aproximadamente, cerca de, mais ou menos
そこそこに: (そこそこに) - hurriedly; in a hurry
そこはかとない: (sokohakatonai) - fraco, leve, vago, nebuloso, indeterminado, toque de ..., pitada de ...
そこはかとなく: (sokohakatonaku) - de alguma forma, por algum motivo
そこへ持ってきて: (そこへもってきて) - what is worse; to make matters worse
そこまで: (そこまで) - go that far; to that extent
そこら中: (そこらじゅう) - everywhere; all over the place
そこら辺: (そこらへん) - hereabouts; around there; that area
そこんち: (そこんち) - (from そこの家) that house
そこ退け: (そこのけ) - superior to (e.g. professional, etc. in ability or achievement); ignoring (one thing) for (another)
そそける: (そそける) - to be nappy; to get fluffy
そそけ立つ: (そそけだつ) - to be nappy/to be disheveled (hair); to shudder
そそられる: (そそられる) - to be interesting; to be fascinating; to be tantalizing; to be intriguing
そそり勃つ: (そそりたつ) - (pun on そそり立つ)  to become erect (penis, nipple, etc.); to tower (like an erection)
そそり立つ: (そそりたつ) - to rise (steeply); to tower; to soar
そっくり: (そっくり) - all/altogether/entirely/completely; exactly like/just like
そっくり返る: (そっくりかえる) - to throw one's chest out; to hold one's head high
そっち系: (そっちけい) - person with differing ideology, attitudes, etc. to one's own
そっと: (そーっと) - softly; gently; quietly; secretly
そっぽを向く: (そっぽをむく) - to turn away/to face away/to ignore; to be uncooperative/to be unconciliatory
そっ歯: (そっぱ) - prominent front teeth; buckteeth; projecting teeth
そつ: (そつ) - slip-up/miss; waste/wasteful or pointless action
そと湯: (そとゆ) - open air bath (in an inn, onsen, etc.); external hot spring bath
そない: (そない) - so; to such an extent; such
そのこと自体は: (そのことじたいは) - as such ....
そのまさかだ: (そのまさかだ) - (often as resp. to まさか...)  yes it is!; it surely is; certainly
そのよう: (そのよう) - that kind of; of the sort; of the kind; such
その一方: (そのいっぽう) - in contrast; meanwhile; in the meantime
その上: (そのかみ) - a long time ago; in those days; once upon a time
その中: (そのなか) - (usu. ~に, ~で) wherein; therein; thereinto
その事: (そのこと) - that; the matter in question
その他: (sonohoka) - etc., caso contrário, além disso, além do mais, o resto, os outros, e assim por diante
その他にも: (そのほかにも) - in addition; furthermore; also
その他大勢: (そのたおおぜい) - (and) many others; extras (in film)
その代り: (そのかわり) - instead; but (on the other hand)
その代わり: (そのかわり) - instead; but (on the other hand)
その先: (そのさき) - beyond that point; after that
その内: (そのうち) - before very long; soon; eventually; sooner or later; of the previously mentioned
その内に: (そのうちに) - one of these days; sooner or later; eventually
その分: (そのぶん) - to that extent; accordingly/that being the case/because of that/this means that ...; that state/that condition
その割には: (そのわりには) - unexpectedly; unusually; considering all that
その割りには: (そのわりには) - unexpectedly; unusually; considering all that
その反面: (そのはんめん) - on the other hand
その場: (そのば) - there/that situation/that occasion; the spot (i.e. "on the spot")/immediately/then and there
その場しのぎ: (そのばしのぎ) - stopgap; makeshift; temporary measure
その場凌ぎ: (そのばしのぎ) - stopgap; makeshift; temporary measure
その場合には: (そのばあいには) - in that case
その場限り: (そのばかぎり) - temporary; ad hoc
その外: (そのた) - (そのた is more the written form) etc.; otherwise; besides; in addition; the rest; the others; and so forth
その後: (sonoato) - depois disso, posteriormente, a partir daí
その手は食わない: (そのてはくわない) - I am not going to fall for that trick; that trick won't work on me
その折り: (そのおり) - on that occasion; at that time
その方: (そのほう) - you (referring to one's inferior)
その日: (そのひ) - that day; the very same day
その日その日: (そのひそのひ) - each day; from day to day; day-to-day
その日暮し: (そのひぐらし) - financially scraping by/meagre existence (meager)/hand to mouth existence; living one's life without plan/living life day-by-day/taking life one day at a time
その日暮らし: (そのひぐらし) - financially scraping by/meagre existence (meager)/hand to mouth existence; living one's life without plan/living life day-by-day/taking life one day at a time
その昔: (そのむかし) - a long time ago; in those days
その時: (そのとき) - at that time; at that moment; then; on that occasion
その時はその時: (そのときはそのとき) - We'll think about it when the time comes
その時以来: (そのときいらい) - since that time; since then; from that point (on)
その晩: (そのばん) - that night/that evening; over the course of the evening
その気: (そのケ) - euph. for (male or female) homosexuality; interest in same gender
その気になる: (そのきになる) - to feel like it; to get to think that way; to become so minded
その為: (そのため) - hence; for that reason
その物: (そのもの) - the very thing; itself
その癖: (そのくせ) - and yet; even so; nonetheless; for all that
その筈: (そのはず) - only natural; no wonder; as expected; of course; as it should be
その筋: (そのすじ) - that field; the authorities (esp. the police)
その節: (そのせつ) - at that time; that time
その罪を憎んでその人を憎まず: (そのつみをにくんでそのひとをにくまず) - (proverb)  condemn the offense, but not the offender; detest the sin, but weep for the sinner
その足で: (そのあしで) - straight (from one place to another); going right onto; on the way; simultaneously; incidentally; directly; at once
その辺: (そのへん) - around there/near there; or thereabouts/or so; such a matter/such a thing
その辺り: (そのあたり) - thereabouts/vicinity/that area; that situation/those circumstances
その通り: (そのとおり) - just like that; quite so; I agree
その道: (sonomichi) - this road (caminho, rua, via, etc.); line (of business), profession, trade
